mapper.select: select * from arrange where c_id= #{id} and date_format(date,'%Y-%m-%d') =date_format(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d')
select count(*) FROM `order` where s_id = #{s_id} and status=0 and isDelete=0 and date_format(date,'%Y-%m-%d') =date_format(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.update:
update arrange
a=a-1
b=b-1
c=c-1
d=d-1
e=e-1
f=f-1
where c_id=#{c_id} and date_format(date,'%Y-%m-%d') =date_format(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d')

update arrange
a=a+1
b=b+1
c=c+1
d=d+1
e=e+1
f=f+1
where c_id=#{c_id} and date_format(date,'%Y-%m-%d') =date_format(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d')
update `order` set status=2 where s_id=#{s_id} and status=0 and date_format(endTime,'%Y-%m-%d %T') < date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d %T');
update `order` set status=#{status} where id=#{id} and NOW() BETWEEN startTime and endTime;
update `order` set status=#{status} where id=#{id} and date_format(startTime,'%Y-%m-%d %T') > date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d %T');
mapper.select: select o.*,c.name,c.phone,c.car from `order` o left join coach c on o.c_id = c.id where o.s_id =#{s_id} and o.status=#{status} and o.isDelete=0 order by id desc

select o.*,s.name as s_name,s.phone as s_phone from `order` o left join student s on o.s_id = s.id where o.c_id =#{c_id} and o.status=#{status} and date_format(o.date,'%Y-%m-%d') =date_format(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') order by id desc

select o.*,s.name as s_name,s.phone as s_phone from `order` o left join student s on o.s_id = s.id where o.c_id =#{c_id} and (o.status=1 or o.status=2) and date_format(o.date,'%Y-%m-%d') =date_format(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') order by id desc
